helper: You can copy or share these pre-filled templates for various banking requests. Replace the [bracketed] fields with your actual details.

items.title: Account Closure Request
items.subject: Request for Closure of Bank Account - [Account Number]
items.body:
To,
The Branch Manager,
[Bank Name],
[Branch Name]

Subject: Request for closure of my Savings Account No: [Account Number]

Respected Sir/Madam,

I am maintaining a savings account with your branch (A/c No: [Account Number]). Due to personal reasons, I am unable to maintain this account further and would like to request its permanent closure.

Please find enclosed my unused cheque book, debit card, and passbook for cancellation. I request you to transfer the remaining balance in this account to my other bank account mentioned below via NEFT/IMPS.

Beneficiary Name: [Your Name]
Bank Name: [Other Bank Name]
IFSC Code: [Other IFSC]
Account Number: [Other Account Number]

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

[Your Name]
Mobile: [Your Mobile Number]
Date: [Current Date]

items.title: Stop EMI Auto-Debit (NACH)
items.subject: Request to Stop Auto-Debit/NACH for Loan Account - [Loan Number]
items.body:
To,
The Branch Manager,
[Bank Name],

Subject: Instructions to stop auto-debit (NACH) for Loan A/c: [Loan Number]

Respected Sir/Madam,

I have an ongoing loan with your bank (Loan A/c No: [Loan Number]). I would like to request you to stop the monthly auto-debit (NACH/ECS) instructions for the EMI payment from my linked Savings Account [Savings A/c Number] effective from [Start Month/Date].

I will be making the future payments manually/via an alternative method as discussed with the loan department. Kindly confirm the cancellation of the mandate.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

[Your Name]
Date: [Current Date]

items.title: Report Unauthorized Transaction
items.subject: Immediate Action: Unauthorized Transaction in Account [Account Number]
items.body:
To,
The Nodal Officer/Branch Manager,
[Bank Name],

Subject: Reporting of unauthorized transaction of Rs. [Amount] on [Date]

Respected Sir/Madam,

I am writing to report an unauthorized transaction that occurred in my account/card on [Date] at [Time]. I have not authorized or initiated this payment.

Transaction Details:
- Amount: [Amount]
- Date & Time: [Date/Time]
- Ref No/UTR: [Ref Number]

I have already blocked my card/net-banking through the mobile app/customer care. As per RBI guidelines on Zero Liability, I am reporting this within 3 days of the occurrence. Kindly investigate and reverse the amount to my account.

Attached is the screenshot of the transaction alert and the complaint filed on the Cybercrime portal.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

[Your Name]
Mobile: [Your Mobile Number]
Date: [Current Date]

items.title: Reactivate Dormant Account
items.subject: Request for Reactivation of Dormant Account - [Account Number]
items.body:
To,
The Branch Manager,
[Bank Name],
[Branch Name]

Subject: Request for reactivation of my Dormant Savings A/c No: [Account Number]

Respected Sir/Madam,

My savings account (A/c No: [Account Number]) has been inoperative for over 2 years and is currently marked as 'Dormant'. I wish to reactivate this account for regular operations.

I am enclosing a self-attested copy of my KYC documents (Aadhaar/PAN) for verification. Please let me know if any further formalities or a fresh deposit is required to complete the process.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

[Your Name]
Mobile: [Your Mobile Number]
Date: [Current Date]

items.title: Request for Loan NOC
items.subject: Request for No Objection Certificate (NOC) for Closed Loan A/c - [Loan Number]
items.body:
To,
The Loan Department,
[Bank Name],

Subject: Request for NOC and Return of Original Documents for Loan A/c: [Loan Number]

Respected Sir/Madam,

I have successfully repaid the entire outstanding amount of my [Loan Type] (A/c No: [Loan Number]). I request you to kindly issue the No Objection Certificate (NOC) / No Dues Certificate for the same.

Also, please return my original documents submitted during the loan application (e.g., Sale Deed, RC, etc.) and remove the hypothecation/lien from the records.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

[Your Name]
Mobile: [Your Mobile Number]
Date: [Current Date]

items.title: Complaint to Banking Ombudsman
items.subject: Formal Complaint against [Bank Name] - Unresolved Grievance
items.body:
To,
The Banking Ombudsman,
Reserve Bank of India,

Subject: Formal complaint against [Bank Name] regarding [Brief Issue]

Respected Sir/Madam,

I am filing this formal complaint against [Bank Name] as my grievance regarding [Describe Issue] has not been resolved satisfactorily by the bank.

Complaint Details:
- Bank Name: [Bank Name]
- Branch Name: [Branch Name]
- Complaint Ref No: [Bank Complaint Ref]
- Date of first complaint: [Initial Date]

I have already approached the bank's internal grievance cell and the Nodal Officer, but did not receive a resolution within the 30-day period. I request your intervention to resolve this matter.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

[Your Name]
Mobile: [Your Mobile Number]
Address: [Your Address]
Date: [Current Date]
